mapper.select: SELECT u.avatar_url, u.nick_name, u.user_id FROM followers f LEFT JOIN `user` u ON f.following_id = u.user_id WHERE f.follower_id = #{followerId}

SELECT u.user_id, u.nick_name, u.avatar_url, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM followers WHERE follower_id = 1 AND following_id = u.user_id) AS isFollowed FROM followers f LEFT JOIN `user` u ON f.follower_id = u.user_id WHERE f.following_id = #{followingId}
